post:
Hello LET,

My name is Haris, from PieLayer, and I have several offers for LowEndTalk readers.

**About us:**

PieLayer has officially opened its doors in 2012. It is a brand developed to offer low end prices on hosting services both in EU and US. We use modern hardware with an Intel CPU, 32-128GB of RAM, and SATA / SSDs in RAID 10 for both speed and redundancy. We have services available in various locations, including Germany and the US. Everything in Los Angeles is pure SSD.


**NEW WINTER2K16 OFFERS**

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+- 

**OpenVZ 2GB Classic range**
    
    2GB RAM
    2 vCPU cores
    45GB HDD space ( pure SSD in Los Angeles )
    1000GB traffic
    1000 Mbit uplink ( 100 Mbit in Germany )
    1x IPv4
    10x IPv6
    OpenVZ/SolusVM
    
    Coupon:  WTI62H0XVQ
    $35/YEAR!
    
    Order in New York - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=10
    Order in Frankfurt, DE - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=15
    Order in Los Angeles - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=28
-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-

    2 TB traffic

    1x IPv4 & 10x IPv6
    KVM/SolusVM

**OpenVZ US Storage 100GB deal**

    512MB DDR3 RAM
    1 vCPU core
    100 GB HDD RAID 10 space ( guaranteed resources, feel free to consume all allocated space! )
    800 GB traffic @ 1000 Mbit uplink
    1x IPv4 & 10x IPv6
    New York City,US based
    OpenVZ/SolusVM
    
    
    $15/year
    
    Order in New York City - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=79

**OpenVZ Germany Storage 100GB deal** 

    512MB DDR3 RAM
    1 vCPU core
    100 GB HDD RAID 10 space ( guaranteed resources, feel free to consume all allocated space! )
    800 GB traffic @ 100 Mbit uplink
    1x IPv4 & 10x IPv6

We accept payment via PayPal, PerfectMoney, and Bitcoin. We have a 5-day refund policy ( valid only if there is hardware issue ). Additional IPv4 addresses are $1.75 per month; bulk pricing is available. For more information, have a read our [Terms of Service](http://pielayer.com/index.php/terms).
